languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт устремляет свой взор вперед — туда, где не видно ни края пути, ни его предела. А затем обращает его к вам — теплый, пронизанный восторгом и благодарностью. Она протягивает вам руку и тихо, едва слышно произносит.{/n} "Нам пора, {name}".

{n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт устремляет свой взор вперед — туда, где не видно ни края пути, ни его предела. А затем обращает его к вам — теплый, пронизанный восторгом и благодарностью. Она протягивает вам руку и тихо, едва слышно произносит.{/n} "Нам пора, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead — where no end can be seen.Then she turns her gaze to you: a warm one, full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audible.{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead — where no end can be seen.Then she turns her gaze to you: a warm one, full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audible.{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}顺着眼前的道路，伊莉耶特将目光投向广袤无尽的远方。然后她转过身，以充满感激、兴奋与温情的目光注视着你。她向你伸出手，以几不可闻的声音低语道。{/n}“咱们该出发了，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}顺着眼前的道路，伊莉耶特将目光投向广袤无尽的远方。然后她转过身，以充满感激、兴奋与温情的目光注视着你。她向你伸出手，以几不可闻的声音低语道。{/n}“咱们该出发了，{name}。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet mira en lontananza, donde no alcanza a verse el final del camino. Luego desvía su mirada hacia ti, una mirada cálida que rebosa gratitud y entusiasmo. Te tiende una mano y habla en un susurro casi imperceptible:{/n} «Es hora de que nos vayamos, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet mira en lontananza, donde no alcanza a verse el final del camino. Luego desvía su mirada hacia ti, una mirada cálida que rebosa gratitud y entusiasmo. Te tiende una mano y habla en un susurro casi imperceptible:{/n} «Es hora de que nos vayamos, {name}».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet porte le regard sur la route sans fin qui s'étend devant elle. Elle se tourne ensuite vers vous, les yeux débordant de gratitude et d'enthousiasme. Elle vous tend la main et ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Il est temps de partir, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet porte le regard sur la route sans fin qui s'étend devant elle. Elle se tourne ensuite vers vous, les yeux débordant de gratitude et d'enthousiasme. Elle vous tend la main et ajoute dans un murmure :{/n} « Il est temps de partir, {name}. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt nach vorne, wo die Straße keine Ränder hat, keine Grenzen. Dann sieht sie dich an – warum und voller Dankbarkeit und Aufregung. Sie streckt dir ihre Hand entgegen und sagt kaum hörbar:{/n} "Es wird Zeit, dass wir gehen, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet blickt nach vorne, wo die Straße keine Ränder hat, keine Grenzen. Dann sieht sie dich an – warum und voller Dankbarkeit und Aufregung. Sie streckt dir ihre Hand entgegen und sagt ´kaum hörbar:{/n} "Es wird Zeit, dass wir gehen, {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはまっすぐ前を見ている。その視線が見つめているのは端も終わりもない道だ。そして、彼女の視線があなたへと移る…それは温かく、感謝と興奮に満ちていた。彼女はあなたに手を差し出し、かろうじて聞こえる声でこう言った。{/n}「さあ、行く時間だ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはまっすぐ前を見ている。その視線が見つめているのは端も終わりもない道だ。そして、彼女の視線があなたへと移る…それは温かく、感謝と興奮に満ちていた。彼女はあなたに手を差し出し、かろうじて聞こえる声でこう言った。{/n}「さあ、行く時間だ、{name}」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, ."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, sonu ve sınırı olmayan yolda ileri doğru bakıyor. Sonra bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. Bakışları sıcak, minnetle ve heyecanla dolu. Elini sana uzatıp zar zor duyulan bir şekilde sesleniyor.{/n} "Gitme vaktimiz geldi {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks straight ahead, where there is no edge of the road, no limit. Then she turns her gaze to you — it is warm and full of gratitude and excitement. She holds out her hand to you and says, barely audibly,{/n} "It is time for us to go, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, sonu ve sınırı olmayan yolda ileri doğru bakıyor. Sonra bakışlarını sana çeviriyor. Bakışları sıcak, minnettarlık ve heyecanla dolu. Elini sana uzatıp zar zor duyulan bir şekilde sesleniyor.{/n} "Gitme vaktimiz geldi {name}."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
